name: Derek Dilbeck
text: We normally eat local pizza and the only chain Iâ€™ll eat is hungry Howies. This location is definitely the best one we have been to. I have ordered here probably a good 15 times in the last 2 years of living here and I can say I have never â€¦More

name: Chrissy mace
text: Pizza was decent, we had the garlic crust junior size pepperoni and they weren't too bad! It's not an eat in restaurant, more order ahead or take and go. They do have a couple of outdoor tables with umbrellas to eat at. I'd go again. Would've been 5 stars if the guy at the counter had any personality, not even a smile?

name: Mau Wow
text: Pleasantly surprised at this locations right on pizza deals.  Good value for the price.  Same expected quality as Little Ceaser's but it actually tastes so much better though.  Good topping distribution and extra sauce got the order right.

name: Justin Beutel
text: I had ordered online but after reviewing my receipt I realized I had ordered from the wrong location so I immediately called and canceled my order and the manager told me I'd get my refund. I thought this issue was solved yet I ended up â€¦More

name: Rex Butler
text: First time visit. There is no inside seating so we got it to go. Very, very good. We ordered a large 1/2 meat 1/2 veggie on thin crust and the wife got a salad.

name: BK Carter
text: They do a great job with service and delivery.  They really hustle and have a nice app to track everything.  Pizza is just ok, but price is outstanding with a coupon.

name: Katherine Goerner
text: Love the pizza here. Of chain pizza stores, Hungry Howie's offers the most variety and tastes amazing. They get the flavor balance just right, and every bite is worth every penny spent. Staff is friendly, service fast, and the app is easy â€¦More

name: Shun Young
text: 1st every going....LOVEDDDDDDD ITTTTT

name: LaQuesha Cannon
text: Great staff! Super friendly and helpful in getting my order placed. The food was delicious and Courtney and her staff were a hail mary for me and my team. Overall awesome job!

name: Michael Hudak
text: First time, loved the pizza, will definitely be back

name: Princess Foster
text: Great friendly staff and food, low prices

name: Danielle Keller
text: Supervisor went above and beyond to correct a bad experience.

name: Robo Williams
text: The crust the crust the crust. What a delightful pizza. All three steak, chicken,  and pepperoni n cheese where so good.  We shated them but got to go back for more.

name: Landon Burleyson
text: Service and pizza was good, I'll be coming here more often

name: Paula Montes
text: Nice workers and great food

name: Justin Murphy I
text: Always great service, good people here.

name: Alex Nestor
text: I'd have to say this is a must visit type of place!! Food is delicious especially the subs.. Should call ahead oftime with your order as it is about a 15 min wait but its definitely worth it!!

name: Patrick Fezza
text: Great prices, friendly people in the store.  Kids loved the stuffed crust pizza

name: Melissa Rivera
text: Good pizza, horrible management. We waited  almost an hour for pizza and we were told would get to us in 30, and we called we were told "they are short staffed". As former employee maybe they. An start hiring clean sober people to manage and work as opposed to druggies or recovering addicts....

name: Bad Donkey Customs
text: Fast, Very Good and Cheap!  Can't get any better than that.

name: Jordan Allen
text: Delicious pizza. I really love the crust selection - makes this place unique among many pizza places. Good food, low cost, friendly staff.

name: paul hoskins
text: Great pizza.  Quick pick up

name: Sylvia Eccles
text: We waited quite a while for our seat but it was worth it. The pizza was good and the server was friendly. We enjoyed our experience and would go back again.

name: Daryll Coleman
text: Very good service, and the food is great, me and my girlfriend went yesterday and got the calzone, one of those fed both of us can't beat the price they give u your money's worth

name: Scott Oleson
text: Will be my last time visiting the restaurant! I usually visit when certain people are there. I decided to give these kids a chance. I placed my order and watched the kid go straight to making my pizza without washing his hands.

name: Antonio Teamer
text: Great food and super fast delivery!

name: Rachel Trierwiler
text: Sweet sweet Hungry Howies Cornelius donated food to the donation drive for fire victims of Admirals Quarters.  It was delicious and thank you so much for being so amazing to the community.

name: Chris A.K.T.
text: Very disappointing. Only ever had good experiences with Hungry Howieâ€™s, but not this location. We placed the order and they told us 45 minutes. An hour later there was no pizza... so I called the store. I told the lady my issue - she just â€¦More

name: Shawn Hicks
text: Food was the most bland that I've ever eaten.  Thought I was eating hospital pizza subs.  Definitely not meant for commercial consumption. Haven't tried there pizza, this is why they get 2 stars.

name: Teresa McCorkle
text: The pizza is just better than other pizza places.

name: Jolonda McAllister
text: Had the chicken bacon ranch pizza with butter cheese sauce. It was yummy, just wish the pizza crust was a little softer & didn't scrape the roof of our mouths. But it was good & I would eat here again.

name: Charles From the USA
text: Great service and pizza

name: Sam Galphin
text: I've only ever done carry out here and they are always in disarray.  That being said the pizza is good and the price is right.  Just be prepared to be patient with the staff.

name: carrie drusin
text: I used to be a manager at Little Caesars and I've never been to Hungry Howies before now so when I walked in and saw the set up, I was thinking the food would be similar. Boy was I surprised. This pizza is awesome. So good and fresh. Hands down better than Little Caesars. I'll definitely be coming back.

name: Casey Brewster
text: I did have a few issues one evening after ordering a pizza but the franchise owner called to apologize and made sure to correct his staff about the late pizza delivery . I appreciated the great customer service in handling an error of his employees . Always great tasting pizza .

name: Cheyenne Tutherow
text: I just waited an hour for a howie roll to be delivered to me 5 minutes away . One howie roll should not take an hour to be delivered and when it got here of course it was basically cold . If youâ€™re working and dont have time to leave work and need something delievered i wouldnt recommend here .

name: Carly
text: Love the subs.

name: Alivia Henderson
text: Good food, I wish they had more choices for singles who are looking for one meal. There are no individual combos here.

name: Brad Simms
text: It's good not awesome. For a franchise place that does delivery I would go with this place over others

name: KD
text: Happy employees, delicious pizza. Counting the days until you pop up in Mooresville.  ðŸ˜‰ â€¦More

name: Wrelyn S
text: Omg it was so good!

name: Eric Holloway
text: Best for when you need your pizza fix but don't want to spend a ton of money.

name: Pharoah Eros
text: If you want an average pizza at an above average place... lucky you, you have arrived.

name: Alexander DuCharme
text: Great job.

name: Todd DeMatteo
text: Always good food, fast any time, any mistakes corrected no problems,always good experience.

name: Landon Robinson
text: Some people have a beef with Hungry Howies. I tend to get my Hungry Howies with beef. Which isn't' as good as sausage, but still tasty. A step above low/mid-grade "fast" pizza, but not up there with the greats like your local NY/chicago â€¦More

name: PeaCe2A11 Ackers
text: Nice people and great pizza. The prices are great too.

name: Leidy Alfaro
text: Ate a large pizza with a topping and a soda for less than 10$. That was amazing !!

name: Sagan Cichocki
text: The guy was about to close up shop so made the pizza even though he was getting ready to clean. I appreciated the assistance and will go there again for good quick and easy pizza.

name: Joan Watts
text: Delicious.

name: Ashleigh Keyes
text: My favorite this crust pizza! Problem is there  is not any near my house

name: Steve jones
text: Jimmy W. is a hardworking employee.  Pizza is good too

name: Priscilla Witt
text: Didnâ€™t know i had to specify I wanted CHEESE ON MY ORIGINAL ROUND PIZZA. It came in looking like a bloody disaster. Jeez.

name: Rob Deckert
text: Best pizza crust and friendly staff!

name: That Guy Ed Smith
text:
Terrible on a corporate level.
Update: roaches are still everywhere, and the department of labor is involved due to this company not paying back wages.

name: Ashley Hartle
text: Amazing chicken bacon with ranch crust!

name: Angie R
text: Hungry Howieâ€™s has helped my church out in a pinch. Theyâ€™re quick, reliable, and the teens loved the pizza!

name: Alyssa
text: Called 5 consecutive times at 12:00 with no answer. Yes it's late and you may not want to serve anymore guests. But website says 1am. Needless to say I have a house full of bummed out hungry people.

name: Angelo Guercio
text: Absolutely awful.

name: Cory Rose
text: Amazingly great!!!!
